igagasi: Ukuphazamiseka kokudlulisa amandla ngaphandle kokuthutha izinto
imvamisa: Inani lemijikelezo yamagagasi edlula iphoyinti ngesikhathi esinikeziwe
ubude begagasi: Ibanga phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili ahambisanayo egagasi
ubukhulu: Ukugudluzwa okukhulu kwephoyinti ukusuka ekulinganeni kwayo ngamagagasi
i-electromagnetic spectrum: Ibanga lawo wonke amaza kagesi angaba khona
i-voltage: Umehluko ongaba khona phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili kusekethe
kazibuthe: I-Magnet idalwe amandla kagesi ngokusebenzisa ikhoyili
i-electroscope: Ithuluzi elibona ubukhona kanye nophawu lokushajwa kukagesi
isifunda: Umzila ovaliwe ovumela amandla kagesi ukuthi ageleze
uchungechunge: Isekhethi enazo zonke izingxenye ezixhunywe ku-loop eyodwa
ngokuhambisana: Isekhethi enezingxenye ezixhunywe kuwo wonke amagatsha amaningi
umthetho we-ohm: Ubudlelwano phakathi kwe-voltage, yamanje, kanye nokumelana (V = IR)
ilensi: Izinto ezibonisa ngale ezingagxila noma zihlukanise imisebe yokukhanya
ukuzindla: Ukubuyela emuva kokukhanya, umsindo, noma amanye amagagasi ukusuka phezulu
ukuphikisa: Ukugoba kokukhanya njengoba kudlula kusuka kwesinye isikhungo kuya kwesinye
optics: Igatsha le-physics lifunda ukukhanya kanye nezakhiwo zakho
